classified_components.reasoning: The axle assembly in both ICE and EV vehicles serves the function of transmitting torque to the wheels, remaining essential for propulsion.

The differential is a mechanical component that connects and drives the left and right wheels differently. It's essential in both Internal Combustion Engine (ICE) and Electric Vehicle (EV) vehicles for proper traction control.
The transmission component is required to control the rotational speed of the drivetrain in both ICE and EV vehicles.
Engine mount serves as a support for the internal combustion engine (ICE), but is also used in electric vehicles (EVs) to secure other components such as battery pack or electric motor.
